body:
I'm so sorry, I know there are lots of posts like this, but I really need the community's help. Moderators, if this is considered a spammy topic, please feel free to block. I understand.

Herro

So 1.8 is bound to come out soon, I just need some suggestions for the possible feature of name change. 

Please try not to say "midnight beast" or something, i'm thinking of a COMPLETE REVAMP of my username.

side note: got prestige 1 today ^-^

replies.body: Mojang/Minecraft said there would be UUIDs, so every player has a UUID and then the bans and so on aren't messed up. The UUID is 16 letters and numbers long. They also said, the name change would cost so much, that you can buy a new account for the money.
